00032 #ifndef STRING_TOKENIZER_H
00033 #define STRING_TOKENIZER_H
00034 
00035 #include <vector>
00036 
00037 namespace cedrus
00038 {
00048     template<typename string_type>
00049     std::vector<string_type> tokenize(const string_type &str, const string_type &delimiters)
00050     {
00051         std::vector<string_type> tokens;
00052         string_type::size_type last_pos = 0, pos = 0;
00053         int count = 0;
00054 
00055         if(str.length() < 1)
00056             return tokens;
00057 
00058         pos = str.find_first_of(delimiters, last_pos);
00059         while(string_type::npos != pos || string_type::npos != last_pos)
00060         {
00061             // found a token, add it to the vector
00062             tokens.push_back(str.substr(last_pos, pos-last_pos));
00063 
00064             // skip delimiters
00065             last_pos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, pos);
00066 
00067             if((string_type::npos != pos) && (str.substr(pos, last_pos-pos).length() > 1))
00068             {
00069                 count = str.substr(pos, last_pos-pos).length();
00070             }
00071 
00072             pos = str.find_first_of(delimiters, last_pos);
00073         }
00074 
00075         return tokens;
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 #endif // STRING_TOKENIZER
